backend/main.mo: Actor defines admin auth, media storage mixins, and data models for vehicles, promotions, testimonials, blog posts, contacts, media assets, and visitor stats.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs for admin media manager and CMS save/publish fixes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend components, pages, and admin tools for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining base styles, theme variables, and dark mode color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading the main TypeScript module.
frontend/REDEPLOYMENT.md: Guide describing how to rebuild and redeploy the frontend canister and verify all public and admin routes including media manager authorization.
frontend/src/admin/AdminGuard.tsx: Component enforcing admin authentication with optional emergency bypass and redirect logic.
frontend/src/admin/AdminLayout.tsx: Admin layout component with sidebar navigation, active-state logic, and logout handling for admin pages.
frontend/src/admin/auth/adminSession.ts: Manages admin session storage with localStorage and cookies, including migration from legacy keys and bypass session creation.
Enables or disables a debug-only authentication bypass that auto-creates a Super Admin session.
frontend/src/admin/components/AccessDeni: Displays an access denied message with a redirect button to the admin login page.
frontend/src/admin/components/BlogFormDi: Dialog for creating or editing blog posts with fields, image picker, and publish options.
frontend/src/admin/components/ConfirmDel: Reusable confirmation dialog for delete actions with customizable title, description, and loading state.
Generic CRUD table supporting search, edit/delete actions, and optional published status display.
frontend/src/admin/components/media/Medi: Displays and filters media assets with delete support and session‑aware error handling.
Modal for selecting a media asset with search, preview grid, and session‑aware loading states.
Upload button that reads a file as a data URL and creates a new media asset with progress feedback.
frontend/src/admin/components/PromotionF: Dialog for adding or editing promotions with fields, image picker, and publish toggle.
frontend/src/admin/components/Testimonia: Dialog component for creating or editing testimonials with fields for text, rating, image, and publish state.
frontend/src/admin/components/VehicleFor: Large form dialog for adding or editing vehicles, including basic info, media, variants, specs, and commercial features.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/C: Editor UI for toggling boolean commercial vehicle feature flags via checkboxes.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/T: React form component for editing vehicle technical specs and managing additional features.
frontend/src/admin/components/vehicles/V: UI for adding, editing, and removing vehicle variants, including features and pricing adjustments.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminCmsQuer: React Query hooks for admin CMS operations like managing media assets, contacts, and credit simulations.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminLoginDe: Deprecated empty module kept only to avoid breaking imports.
frontend/src/admin/hooks/useAdminSession: Manages admin session state, validation, login logic, and optional emergency bypass login flow.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminLoginDebug: Debug page allowing manual testing of admin login with UI feedback and result display.
Admin login page handling authentication, redirects, form input, and an emergency bypass mode.
frontend/src/admin/pages/AdminProfilePag: Admin profile editor that loads user data, allows updates, and saves changes via API.
frontend/src/admin/pages/BlogAdminPage.t: Blog management page supporting listing, searching, creating, editing, and deleting blog posts.
frontend/src/admin/pages/DashboardPage.t: Dashboard displaying summary counts of vehicles, promotions, testimonials, blog posts, contacts, and simulations.
Leads manager for viewing, searching, and deleting contact form submissions and credit simulations.
frontend/src/admin/pages/MediaManagerPag: Media manager for uploading and managing assets with session‑error handling.
frontend/src/admin/pages/PromotionsAdmin: Promotions management page allowing listing, searching, creating, editing, and deleting promotions.
frontend/src/admin/pages/TestimonialsAdm: Admin page for listing, searching, creating, editing, and deleting testimonials using CRUD dialogs and toast notifications.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VehiclesAdminPa: Admin interface for filtering, managing, and performing CRUD operations on passenger or commercial vehicles.
frontend/src/admin/pages/VisitorStatsAdm: Displays visitor statistics with cards and provides a form to update stats via admin API.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main routing configuration using TanStack Router for all public and admin pages with layouts and guards.
frontend/src/components/forms/ContactFor: Form for submitting contact inquiries, validating required fields, and sending data via mutation.
frontend/src/components/forms/CreditSimu: Form for submitting credit simulation requests with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/GlobalErrorBound: Global React error boundary that catches UI errors and shows a refresh prompt.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Renders the site footer with contact info, social links, and attribution using the current year.
frontend/src/components/layout/PublicLay: Wraps public pages with navbar, optional hero, main content, CTA section, footer, and bottom CTA bar.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Botto: Provides a fixed mobile bottom bar with quick actions for calling, WhatsApp, credit simulation, and menu access.
frontend/src/components/navigation/MainM: Displays a slide-up sheet containing navigation links for mobile menus.
frontend/src/components/navigation/Navba: Implements a responsive navigation bar with links, WhatsApp contact button, and mobile slide-out menu.
frontend/src/components/sections/BottomC: Shows a promotional call-to-action section encouraging users to contact via WhatsApp.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Displays a simple hero banner with a title and tagline.
frontend/src/components/vehicles/Vehicle: Renders a vehicle card with image, pricing, features, navigation to details, and WhatsApp consultation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to Internet Identity, refreshing dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating vehicle, blog, promotion, contact, and interaction data through the actor API.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisitorTracking.ts: Tracks unique visitors and page views by triggering mutations once per session.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and extensive CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/BlogDetailPage.tsx: Loads and displays a single blog post with metadata updates and fallback states.
frontend/src/pages/BlogListPage.tsx: Fetches and lists all blog posts with preview cards and loading state.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehicleDeta: Displays detailed vehicle info with likes, shares, images, and categorized features.
frontend/src/pages/CommercialVehiclesPag: Fetches vehicles, filters commercial types, and renders categorized vehicle sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact form along with contact info, map embed, and consultant details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with banner carousel, featured vehicles, blog posts, and a vehicle search filter.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehicleDetai: Displays detailed passenger vehicle info with images, variants, pricing, likes, and share actions.
frontend/src/pages/PassengerVehiclesPage: Lists all published passenger vehicles with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/PromoPage.tsx: Fetches and displays current promotions with images, descriptions, and terms.
frontend/src/pages/TestimonialsPage.tsx: Shows customer testimonials with ratings, images, and reviewer details.
frontend/src/redeploy/routeSmoke.ts: Defines public and admin routes for smoke testing and utilities to generate checklists and validate route configs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration defining content paths, theme extensions (colors, radius, shadows), custom animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing architecture, constraints, known issues, and current backend/frontend requirements for an automotive website.
